overview: A pure-loving-tribute to sisterhood, dedicated to Candy Royalle (RIP) butch queen, high priestess of poetry. This urgent call to action, this rallying chant, to live not wait, to love not hate created with Lebanese/Palestinian poets, directed/produced by Jacqui North with queers, women of colour and non-binary artists who live in the inner-west including photographers Jamie James and Nicola Bailey.
title: Love & Revolution
